Package jchain.net

Class TxnMemoryPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchain.net.TxnMemoryPool
  • public class TxnMemoryPool
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by miners to simulate an in-memory transaction pool.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int MAX_POOL_SIZE  
      static int MIN_POOL_SIZE  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TxnMemoryPool()
      Returns a new instance of a TxnMemoryPool with a pool size equal to MAX_POOL_SIZE / 2.
      TxnMemoryPool​(int poolSize)
      Returns a new instance of a TxnMemoryPool with a specified pool size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(Transaction tx)
      Adds the transaction tx to the transaction pool onliy if the tx is valid, and the pool is not full.
      boolean contains​(Transaction tx)
      Determines if the transaction pool contains a specified transaction or not.
      Transaction get()
      Return a random transaction in the list.

      • MIN_POOL_SIZE

        public static final int MIN_POOL_SIZE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_POOL_SIZE

        public static final int MAX_POOL_SIZE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • TxnMemoryPool

        public TxnMemoryPool()
        Returns a new instance of a TxnMemoryPool with a pool size equal to MAX_POOL_SIZE / 2.

      • TxnMemoryPool

        public TxnMemoryPool​(int poolSize)
        Returns a new instance of a TxnMemoryPool with a specified pool size. If the pool size is less than MIN_POOL_SIZE, then the pool is initialized to size MIN_POOL_SIZE. If the pool size is greater than MAX_POOL_SIZE, then the pool is initialized to size MAX_POOL_SIZE.
        Parameters:
        poolSize - The size of the transaction pool.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(Transaction tx)
         throws IllegalOperationException
        Adds the transaction tx to the transaction pool onliy if the tx is valid, and the pool is not full.
        Parameters:
        tx - A transaction to add to the pool.
        Throws:
        IllegalOperationException - If the indicated transaction is null or the pool is full.

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(Transaction tx)
        Determines if the transaction pool contains a specified transaction or not.
        Parameters:
        tx - A transaction to check for.
        Returns:
        True if the transaction is in the pool, false otherwise.

      • get

        public Transaction get()
                throws IllegalOperationException
        Return a random transaction in the list.
        Returns:
        A Transaction from the pool.
        Throws:
        IllegalOperationException - If the pool is empty.
